front.title: Management Information Base for IP Version 6: Textual Conventions and General Group

abstract.t: This document is one in the series of documents that provide MIB definitions for for IP Version 6. Specifically, the IPv6 MIB textual conventions as well as the IPv6 MIB General group is defined in this document.
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the IPv6-based internets.
This document specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
